TopicTitle: How to check if everything is full loaded ?

Articles.Content: the Start even is called before the engine is actually ready to go, even before everything finished loading. Which event fires when I can actually launch my vehicle savely ?

You can add a method to the game event onFlightReady, like so:


private void Start() {
     GameEvents.onFlightReady.Add(this.yourMethod);
}

private void yourMethod() {
     //do something
}
